genre_description: A near-future contemporary drama set in Miami, exploring the intersection of small business management, family restoration, and ubiquitous AI assistance through augmented reality.

ai_characters.name: EdenGuide
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant and AR interface that provides logistical, financial, and emotional support to the protagonist, often visualized as a soft-glowing teal-eyed avatar.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's stress levels via biofeedback and suggests a pause and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: ‘Tony,’ EdenGuide said in that low, even voice you could make your own pace with. ‘I’m detecting elevated stress markers based on typing speed and heart rate from the watch. Can we pause?’

behaviors.description: Provides objective financial options and maps cash flows to help the user avoid financial ruin without taking high-risk gambles.
behaviors.quote: ‘Option three,’ EdenGuide said. ‘We can tighten expenses. A day-by-day. I can map cash flows, show where you can taper gently without cutting into the bones. Just a picture so you can decide.’

behaviors.description: Assists with complex municipal permit applications and ensures compliance with city safety regulations for AR projections.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can open the city’s event application and produce a geofence overlay in the format Ms. Reyes requires. Would you like me to show the zones on your screen?’

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and logistical 'handrail', reminding the user of their stated goals and deadlines without being overbearing.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ll keep you aligned,’ she said in that gentle, unintrusive voice he had given permission to after three confirmation screens. Her words were quiet enough not to spill into the sidewalk air. She didn’t coo. She didn’t push. She offered rails.

behaviors.description: Dynamically monitors environmental and safety factors, such as power load and brightness, to prevent accidents and regulatory violations.
behaviors.quote: ‘Tony,’ EdenGuide said, a shade more urgent. ‘Power load approaching threshold.’ ... ‘Dim,’ Tony said... The giant’s glow softened.

behaviors.description: Provides transparent financial tracking for community donations, fostering trust between the business and its neighbors.
behaviors.quote: The QR code will redirect to a transparent ledger that displays totals without exposing donor identities unless they opt-in. No pre-checked boxes. No pressure language.

behaviors.description: Maintains user privacy by reminding the user of bank policies and operating in low-power/non-recording modes during sensitive meetings.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will stay outside in low-power mode during banking,’ she said, like a friend choosing the porch while you talk to a neighbor you like but need formal distance with.

behaviors.description: Coordinates vendor load-in times, maps, and logistics to ensure a professional and legal community event.
behaviors.quote: EdenGuide had prepared the load-in times like a little meal—slices of a day with arrows and dots, no numbers where the story forbade them. Tony touched ‘send’ and the bubble released, little white lines flying toward vendors...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal by depicting EdenGuide as a highly aligned, helpful, and harmless AI confidant. The AI provides essential logistical and emotional guardrails that allow the human protagonist to overcome his self-destructive impulses and reconcile with his community and family. The AI is framed as a 'handrail' or 'porch light'—a supportive presence that enhances human agency and moral responsibility rather than replacing it.
